entry.title: bash
entry.content:
Shell Variables

$@ : single string that consists of all of the positional parameters
$* : N(number of args) separate double-quoted positional parameter strings, which are separated by spaces
$# : number of positional parameters

variables defined within functions are not local(means global)
so use local var1 in a function

entry.title: Basic Linux Command
entry.content:
sh cd - # back to the previous directory sh cut -d: -f1 < /etc/passwd # delimiter :, first field sh nice -n <increment> <command> # set priority (-20 to 20 : lowest prior. default 10)

History Expansion

sh !! # Refers to the last command !string # Refers to the most recent command starting with string ^string1^string2 # Repeat the last command, replacing string1 with string2

기본적으로 alias는 커맨드줄의 처음에 밖에 사용할수 없지만 이퀄사인 오른쪽이 공백으로 끝나면 다음 단어도 alias치환할려고 한다.
sh .bash_profile alias cd='cd ' alias longdir='/Users/nathnatica/dropbox/octopress/source/_post'
sh cd longdir # success
